=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Brian Setzer Orchestra: It's Gonna Rock 'Cause That's What I Do
Review Date: 2015/11/18
Store: Rated:    NR    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
Product Description: ["On June 25th The Brian Setzer Orchestra headlined the opening of the 2010 Montreal Jazz Festival, performing for over 150,000 people!! This DVD captures the entire blistering 1-hour and 40-minute set which was easily one of Brian's greatest performances ever!! We guarantee this is one of the best rock shows you'll ever watch. That's a lot to say, but we mean it! Contains some amazing and rare bonus footage that fans won't want to miss."]
Average Rating: 4.5

Product Title: The Jungle Book (Two-Disc Diamond Edition: Blu-ray / DVD + Digital Copy)
Review Date: 2016/04/07
Store: John Abbott  (Actor),     Bruce Reitherman  (Actor),     Wolfgang Reitherman  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    G    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Action & Adventure
Product Description: ['Now for the first time ever on Blu-ray with glorious digital high definition, Disney’s Jumpin’ Jungle Classic has never looked so lush or sounded so good. Beloved characters, swinging music and new behind-the-scenes bonus features make this Diamond Edition Blu‐ray a must-have for every family’s classic collection. Meet the most unforgettable characters and embark on a thrilling adventure with Mowgli as he journeys deep into the jungle and learns “The Bare Necessities” of life from happy-go-lucky Baloo the bear. Meet Bagheera, the wise old panther, and crazy King Louie, the orangutan. But watch out for the cunning tiger Shere Khan and Kaa, the ssssneakiest snake in the jungle. Explore your family’s wild side as you venture into The Jungle Book for extraordinary adventures and a heartwarming tale that celebrates the true meaning of friendship.']
Average Rating: 4.8

Review Title: A must have with excellent picture quality regardless of format
Rating: 5.0

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Love At First Bite / Once Bitten [Blu-ray]
Review Date: 2016/07/18
Store: Jim Carrey  (Actor),     Lauren Hutton  (Actor),     Howard Storm  (Director),     Stan Dragoti  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Comedy
Product Description: ["LOVE AT FIRST BITE George Hamilton is possibly the tannest vampire in screen history in 1979's Love at First Bite. When Count Dracula (Hamilton) is forced out of his castle to make room for an Olympic training facility, he relocates to New York City in search of discos, blood banks, and the fashion model who just might be the girl of his dreams. Will the Count take a bite out of the Big Apple - or will it's mean streets take a bite out of him? Susan Saint James, Richard Benjamin, Arte Johnson, Dick Shawn and the Jeffersons' Sherman Hemsley and Isabel Sanford also star in this outrageous romance about a guy who really loves the nightlife. ONCE BITTEN Jim Carrey is necking with a vampire in Once Bitten, a 1985 teen comedy also starring Lauren Hutton, Karen Kopins, and Cleavon Little (Blazing Saddles). When a vampire Countess (Hutton) seeks virgin blood, she soon discovers that it's not as easy to come by as it was in the good old days! When she crosses paths with the still-virginal Mark Kendall (Carrey in one of his earliest screen roles), it's a race against time to get to him before he gets it on. Once Bitten is a totally '80s teen vampire flick where the bloodsuckers don't sparkle, but the comedy most certainly does."]
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Horror/Things That Go Bump/Monsters, Comedy', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Jim Carrey, George Hamilton, Howard Storm, Susan Saint James, Stan Dragoti, Lauren Hutton, Sherman HemsleyJim Carrey, George Hamilton, Howard Storm, Susan Saint James, Stan Dragoti, Lauren Hutton, Sherman Hemsley   See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '3 hours and 20 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.12 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SFY15633BR', 'Director': 'Howard Storm, Stan Dragoti', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '3 hours and 20 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 10, 2015', 'Actors': 'Jim Carrey, Lauren Hutton, George Hamilton, Susan Saint James, Sherman Hemsley', 'Studio': 'Shout Factory', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: Wherelse can you get the TWO BEST VAMPIRE COMEDIES. ( George Hamilton / Jim Carey) on one blu-ray disc.  Also check out A VAMPIRE IN BROOKLYN starring Eddie Murphy. Buy all three for several pints to gallons of bloody laughs.  All three are more for adults than little children.
Review Title: Pints and gallons of Vampire comedy!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Vampire In Brooklyn (1995)
Review Date: 2016/09/13
Store: Eddie Murphy  (Actor),     Angela Bassett  (Actor),     Wes Craven  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Warner Home Video, All Titles
Product Description: ['Vampire In Brooklyn (DVD)', "Eddie Murphy's got the bite in this movie mix of bone-chilling horror an d chill-out comedy directed by Wes Craven (A Nightmare on El m Street). As the vampire Maximillian, the popular star is the most diabolical, das hing and definitely undead dude in the 'hood. To add to the macabre fun, Murphy morphs into two other must-see characters: a paunchy preacher an d a fast talking thug. Angela Basset (Waiting to Exhale, What's Love G ot To Do With It) plays the cop whose world is rocked by Maximillian's a ttempts to make her his ma te for eternity. And Kadeem Hardison (TV's A Different World) is the haplessly decaying vampire's sidekick who (a han d here, and ear there) is forever losing things. Brooklyn may be home t o the undead now that Max is around-but means it's livelier than ever!", ']]>']
Average Rating: 4.7

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Rockabilly Riot: Osaka Rocka! - Live in Japan 2016 [Blu-ray]
Review Date: 2016/12/15
Store: Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray
Product Description: ['Three-time Grammy-award-winner BRIAN SETZER’s new concert Blu-ray/CD, ROCKABILLY RIOT: OSAKA ROCKA! - LIVE IN JAPAN--filmed on February 18 at Namba Hatch in Osaka, Japan--is set for release November 4, 2016 via Surfdog Records. Live and loud, the concert encompasses songs from SETZER’s acclaimed 2014 studio album Rockabilly Riot! All Original—a sizzling rockabilly album from start to finish featuring SETZER’s trademark twang and fretboard fire. Also included are classic hits from his Stray Cats days, Brian Setzer Orchestra tunes and tracks from his solo albums. In front of the wildly enthusiastic audience, Brian Setzer and his band—Noah Levy (Drums), Kevin McKendree (Piano and Guitar) and Mark Winchester (Bass)—are firing on all cylinders.']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Brian Setzer Rockabilly Riot: Osaka Rocka! - Live in Japan 2016, Rock', 'Format': 'Blu-ray', 'Contributor': 'Brian Setzer', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.77:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.9 x 5.6 x 0.5 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': '43380208', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray', 'Run time': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Release date': 'August 2, 2021', 'Actors': 'Brian Setzer', 'Studio': 'Surfdog', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Review Text: Brian Setzer rocks Japan!  A must have!
Review Title: Brian Setzer continues to excel!
Rating: 5.0

Store: Jim Carrey  (Actor),     Lauren Hutton  (Actor),     Howard Storm  (Director),     Stan Dragoti  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Comedy
Product Description: ["LOVE AT FIRST BITE George Hamilton is possibly the tannest vampire in screen history in 1979's Love at First Bite. When Count Dracula (Hamilton) is forced out of his castle to make room for an Olympic training facility, he relocates to New York City in search of discos, blood banks, and the fashion model who just might be the girl of his dreams. Will the Count take a bite out of the Big Apple - or will it's mean streets take a bite out of him? Susan Saint James, Richard Benjamin, Arte Johnson, Dick Shawn and the Jeffersons' Sherman Hemsley and Isabel Sanford also star in this outrageous romance about a guy who really loves the nightlife. ONCE BITTEN Jim Carrey is necking with a vampire in Once Bitten, a 1985 teen comedy also starring Lauren Hutton, Karen Kopins, and Cleavon Little (Blazing Saddles). When a vampire Countess (Hutton) seeks virgin blood, she soon discovers that it's not as easy to come by as it was in the good old days! When she crosses paths with the still-virginal Mark Kendall (Carrey in one of his earliest screen roles), it's a race against time to get to him before he gets it on. Once Bitten is a totally '80s teen vampire flick where the bloodsuckers don't sparkle, but the comedy most certainly does."]
Average Rating: 4.7

Product Description: ['Three-time Grammy-award-winner BRIAN SETZER’s new concert Blu-ray/CD, ROCKABILLY RIOT: OSAKA ROCKA! - LIVE IN JAPAN--filmed on February 18 at Namba Hatch in Osaka, Japan--is set for release November 4, 2016 via Surfdog Records. Live and loud, the concert encompasses songs from SETZER’s acclaimed 2014 studio album Rockabilly Riot! All Original—a sizzling rockabilly album from start to finish featuring SETZER’s trademark twang and fretboard fire. Also included are classic hits from his Stray Cats days, Brian Setzer Orchestra tunes and tracks from his solo albums. In front of the wildly enthusiastic audience, Brian Setzer and his band—Noah Levy (Drums), Kevin McKendree (Piano and Guitar) and Mark Winchester (Bass)—are firing on all cylinders.']
